verses.verse: And <WG2532> they came over<WG2064> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> other side<WG4008> of the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> country<WG5561> of the<WG3588> Gadarenes.<WG1046>

And <WG2532> when he<WG846> was come<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> ship,<WG4143> immediately<WG2112> there met<WG528> him<WG846> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> tombs<WG3419> a man<WG444> with<WG1722> an unclean<WG169> spirit,<WG4151>
Who <WG3739> had<WG2192> his dwelling<WG2731> among<WG1722> the<WG3588> tombs;<WG3419> and<WG2532> no man<WG3762> could<WG1410> bind<WG1210> him,<WG846> no, not<WG3777> with chains: <WG254>

Because that he<WG846> had been often<WG4178> bound<WG1210> with fetters<WG3976> and<WG2532> chains,<WG254> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> chains<WG254> had been plucked asunder<WG1288> by<WG5259> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> fetters<WG3976> broken in pieces:<WG4937> neither<WG2532> could<WG2480> any<WG3762> man tame<WG1150> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> always,<WG1275> night<WG3571> and<WG2532> day,<WG2250> he was<WG2258> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> mountains,<WG3735> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> tombs,<WG3418> crying,<WG2896> and<WG2532> cutting<WG2629> himself<WG1438> with stones.<WG3037>
But <WG1161> when he saw<WG1492> Jesus<WG2424> afar off,<WG575> <WG3113> he ran<WG5143> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> him,<WG846>

And <WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> and said,<WG2036> What have I to do with thee,<WG5101> <WG1698> <WG2532> <WG4671> Jesus,<WG2424> thou Son<WG5207> of the<WG3588> most high<WG5310> God?<WG2316> I adjure<WG3726> thee<WG4571> by God,<WG2316> that thou torment<WG928> me<WG3165> not.<WG3361>
For <WG1063> he said<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Come <WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> man,<WG444> thou unclean<WG169> spirit. <WG4151>

And <WG2532> he asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> What <WG5101> is thy<WG4671> name? And<WG3686> <WG2532> he answered,<WG611> saying,<WG3004> My<WG3427> name<WG3686> is Legion:<WG3003> for<WG3754> we are<WG2070> many.<WG4183>
And <WG2532> he besought<WG3870> him<WG846> much<WG4183> that<WG2443> he would not<WG3361> send them away<WG649> <WG846> out<WG1854> of the<WG3588> country.<WG5561>
Now <WG1161> there was<WG2258> there<WG1563> nigh unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> mountains<WG3735> a great<WG3173> herd<WG34> of swine<WG5519> feeding.<WG1006>

And <WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> devils<WG1142> besought<WG3870> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Send<WG3992> us<WG2248> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> swine,<WG5519> that<WG2443> we may enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> forthwith<WG2112> Jesus<WG2424> gave them leave.<WG2010> <WG846> And<WG2532> the<WG3588> unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151> went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> swine:<WG5519> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> herd<WG34> ran violently<WG3729> down<WG2596> a steep place<WG2911> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> (they<WG1161> were<WG2258> about<WG5613> two thousand;)<WG1367> and<WG2532> were choked<WG4155> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> sea.<WG2281>

And <WG1161> they that fed<WG1006> the<WG3588> swine<WG5519> fled,<WG5343> and<WG2532> told<WG312> it in<WG1519> the<WG3588> city,<WG4172> and<WG2532> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> country.<WG68> And<WG2532> they went out<WG1831> to see<WG1492> what<WG5101> it was<WG2076> that was done.<WG1096>

And <WG2532> they come<WG2064> to<WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> see<WG2334> him that was possessed with the devil,<WG1139> and had<WG2192> the<WG3588> legion,<WG3003> sitting,<WG2521> and<WG2532> clothed,<WG2439> and<WG2532> in his right mind:<WG4993> and<WG2532> they were afraid.<WG5399>

And <WG2532> they that saw<WG1492> it told<WG1334> them<WG846> how<WG4459> it befell<WG1096> to him that was possessed with the devil,<WG1139> and<WG2532> also concerning<WG4012> the<WG3588> swine.<WG5519>
And <WG2532> they began<WG756> to pray<WG3870> him<WG846> to depart<WG565> out of<WG575> their<WG846> coasts.<WG3725>

And <WG2532> when he<WG846> was come<WG1684> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> ship,<WG4143> he that had been possessed with the devil<WG1139> prayed<WG3870> him<WG846> that<WG2443> he might be<WG5600> with<WG3326> him.<WG846>

Howbeit <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> suffered<WG863> him<WG846> not,<WG3756> but<WG235> saith<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Go <WG5217> home to thy friends, <WG1519> <WG4675> <WG3624> <WG4314> <WG4674> and <WG2532> tell<WG312> them<WG846> how great things<WG3745> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> hath done<WG4160> for thee,<WG4671> and<WG2532> hath had compassion<WG1653> on thee. <WG4571>

And <WG2532> he departed,<WG565> and<WG2532> began<WG756> to publish<WG2784> in<WG1722> Decapolis<WG1179> how great things<WG3745> Jesus<WG2424> had done<WG4160> for him:<WG846> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> men did marvel.<WG2296>

And <WG2532> when Jesus<WG2424> was passed over<WG1276> again<WG3825> by<WG1722> ship<WG4143> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> other side,<WG4008> much<WG4183> people<WG3793> gathered<WG4863> unto<WG1909> him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he was<WG2258> nigh unto<WG3844> the<WG3588> sea.<WG2281>

And, <WG2532> behold,<WG2400> there cometh<WG2064> one<WG1520> of the<WG3588> rulers of the synagogue,<WG752> Jairus<WG2383> by name;<WG3686> and<WG2532> when he saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> he fell<WG4098> at<WG4314> his<WG846> feet,<WG4228>

And <WG2532> besought<WG3870> him<WG846> greatly,<WG4183> saying,<WG3004> My<WG3450> little daughter<WG2365> lieth at the point of death:<WG2192> <WG2079> I pray<WG2443> thee, come<WG2064> and lay<WG2007> thy hands<WG5495> on her,<WG846> that<WG3704> she may be healed;<WG4982> and<WG2532> she shall live.<WG2198>
And <WG2532> Jesus went<WG565> with<WG3326> him;<WG846> and<WG2532> much<WG4183> people<WG3793> followed<WG190> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> thronged<WG4918> him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> a certain<WG5100> woman,<WG1135> which had<WG5607> an<WG1722> issue<WG4511> of blood<WG129> twelve<WG1427> years,<WG2094>

And <WG2532> had suffered<WG3958> many things<WG4183> of<WG5259> many<WG4183> physicians,<WG2395> and<WG2532> had spent<WG1159> all that she had,<WG3956> <WG3844> <WG1438> and<WG2532> was nothing<WG3367> bettered,<WG5623> but<WG235> rather<WG3123> grew worse,<WG2064> <WG1519> <WG5501>
When she had heard<WG191> of<WG4012> Jesus,<WG2424> came<WG2064> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> press<WG3793> behind,<WG3693> and touched<WG680> his<WG846> garment.<WG2440>
For <WG1063> she said,<WG3004> If<WG2579> I may touch<WG680> but his<WG846> clothes,<WG2440> I shall be whole.<WG4982>

And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> the<WG3588> fountain<WG4077> of her<WG846> blood<WG129> was dried up;<WG3583> and<WG2532> she felt<WG1097> in her body<WG4983> that<WG3754> she was healed<WG2390> of<WG575> that plague.<WG3148>

And <WG2532> Jesus,<WG2424> immediately<WG2112> knowing<WG1921> in<WG1722> himself<WG1438> that virtue<WG1411> had gone<WG1831> out of<WG1537> him,<WG846> turned him about<WG1994> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> press,<WG3793> and<WG2532> said,<WG3004> Who <WG5101> touched<WG680> my<WG3450> clothes? <WG2440>

And <WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> said<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Thou seest<WG991> the<WG3588> multitude<WG3793> thronging<WG4918> thee,<WG4571> and<WG2532> sayest<WG3004> thou, Who <WG5101> touched<WG680> me ? <WG3450>
And <WG2532> he looked round about<WG4017> to see<WG1492> her that had done<WG4160> this thing.<WG5124>

But <WG1161> the<WG3588> woman<WG1135> fearing<WG5399> and<WG2532> trembling,<WG5141> knowing<WG1492> what<WG3739> was done<WG1096> in<WG1909> her,<WG846> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> fell down before<WG4363> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> told<WG2036> him<WG846> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> truth.<WG225>

And <WG1161> he<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto her,<WG846> Daughter, <WG2364> thy<WG4675> faith<WG4102> hath made thee whole; <WG4982> <WG4571> go <WG5217> in<WG1519> peace,<WG1515> and<WG2532> be<WG2468> whole<WG5199> of<WG575> thy<WG4675> plague. <WG3148>

While he<WG846> yet<WG2089> spake,<WG2980> there came<WG2064> from<WG575> the<WG3588> ruler of the synagogue's<WG752> house certain which said,<WG3004> Thy<WG4675> daughter<WG2364> is dead:<WG599> why<WG5101> troublest<WG4660> thou the<WG3588> Master<WG1320> any further?<WG2089>

<WG1161> As soon as<WG2112> Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> that was spoken,<WG2980> he saith<WG3004> unto the<WG3588> ruler of the synagogue,<WG752> Be not afraid, <WG5399> <WG3361> only <WG3440> believe. <WG4100>

And <WG2532> he suffered<WG863> no man<WG3762> to follow<WG4870> him,<WG846> save<WG1508> Peter,<WG4074> and<WG2532> James,<WG2385> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> the<WG3588> brother<WG80> of James.<WG2385>

And <WG2532> he cometh<WG2064> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> house<WG3624> of the<WG3588> ruler of the synagogue,<WG752> and<WG2532> seeth<WG2334> the tumult,<WG2351> and them that wept<WG2799> and<WG2532> wailed<WG214> greatly.<WG4183>

And <WG2532> when he was come in,<WG1525> he saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Why <WG5101> make ye this ado,<WG2350> and<WG2532> weep?<WG2799> the<WG3588> damsel<WG3813> is not dead, <WG599> <WG3756> but <WG235> sleepeth. <WG2518>

And <WG2532> they laughed him to scorn.<WG2606> <WG846> But<WG1161> when he<WG3588> had put them all out,<WG1544> <WG537> he taketh<WG3880> the<WG3588> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> mother<WG3384> of the<WG3588> damsel,<WG3813> and<WG2532> them<WG3588> that were with<WG3326> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> entereth in<WG1531> where<WG3699> the<WG3588> damsel<WG3813> was<WG2258> lying.<WG345>

And <WG2532> he took<WG2902> the<WG3588> damsel<WG3813> by the<WG3588> hand,<WG5495> and said<WG3004> unto her,<WG846> Talitha <WG5008> cumi; <WG2891> which<WG3739> is,<WG2076> being interpreted,<WG3177> Damsel,<WG2877> I say<WG3004> unto thee,<WG4671> arise.<WG1453>

And <WG2532> straightway<WG2112> the<WG3588> damsel<WG2877> arose,<WG450> and<WG2532> walked;<WG4043> for<WG1063> she was<WG2258> of the age of twelve<WG1427> years.<WG2094> And they were astonished<WG1839> with a great<WG3173> astonishment.<WG1611>

And <WG2532> he charged<WG1291> them<WG846> straitly<WG4183> that<WG2443> no man<WG3367> should know<WG1097> it;<WG5124> and<WG2532> commanded<WG2036> that something should be given<WG1325> her<WG846> to eat.<WG5315>
